Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier fire department activity at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier fire department activity at Pulaski.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Halsted, 111th, State, and 115th due to, street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.
